attributes.action: Creation of not for profit trust to manage energy supply & distribution
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that the provision of such an essential strategic necessity as power generation and supply should not lie in the hands of private and foreign enterprise.
We propose all power generation & sales of gas & electricity are carried out by a not for profit trust, who's remit is to ensure the continued power security of the United Kingdom, and fair pricing for consumers. We believe profit has no place in such an essential role and that long term planning & provision must take its place.
